title: Basic Usage
content: For details, see the following example.
findIntroStr: Rate quick rating, which is used to display reviews.

title: Custom 3-segment color
content: You can use colors to define three-segment colors.
findIntroStr: Rate quick rating, which is used to display reviews.

title: Unselected icon color when customized is disabled
content: You can use disabled-void-color to customize the color of the unselected icon.
findIntroStr: Rate quick rating, which is used to display reviews.

title: Icon class name that is not selected when user-defined is disabled
content: You can use disabled-void-icon-class to customize the class name of the icon that is not selected during disabling.
findIntroStr: Rate quick rating, which is used to display reviews.

title: Custom 3-segment icon style
content: You can use icon-classes to customize the 3-part icon style.
findIntroStr: Rate quick rating, which is used to display reviews.

title: Auxiliary Text and Color
content: You can set the auxiliary text content, whether to display the auxiliary text, and the auxiliary text color through the texts show-text text-color attributes.
findIntroStr: Rate quick rating, which is used to display reviews.

title: Size and Placeholder Width
content: You can use size space to separate the size and placeholder width.
findIntroStr: Rate quick rating, which is used to display reviews.

title: Customize the color of unselected icons
content: You can use void-color to define the color of an unselected icon.
findIntroStr: Rate quick rating, which is used to display reviews.

title: Customized unselected icon class name
content: You can use void-icon-class to define the unselected icon class name.
findIntroStr: Rate quick rating, which is used to display reviews.

title: Text prompt under the icon
content: You can use text-on-bottom to define whether to display text prompts under icons.
findIntroStr: Rate quick rating, which is used to display reviews.

title: Half Selection
content: You can use allow-half to define whether half selection is supported.
findIntroStr: Rate quick rating, which is used to display reviews.

title: Disabled
content: You can use disabled to define whether to disable the function.
findIntroStr: Rate quick rating, which is used to display reviews.

title: Score Display
content: You can use show-score score-template to define whether to display scores and the display template.
findIntroStr: Rate quick rating, which is used to display reviews.

title: Single Choice Mode
content: You can use radio to set the single-choice mode.
findIntroStr: Rate quick rating, which is used to display reviews.

title: Maximum Score
content: You can use max to set the maximum score.
findIntroStr: Rate quick rating, which is used to display reviews.

title: Boundaries
content: You can set the lower limit and upper limit by using low-threshold high-threshold, and set the color of the displayed star by using colors
findIntroStr: Rate quick rating, which is used to display reviews.

title: Event
findIntroStr: Rate quick rating, which is used to display reviews.
